alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with gusty outlflow winds will impact portions of east central Carbon and west central Albany Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 512 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Medicine Bow to near Bow River Campground to 9 miles southwest of Saratoga. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Cross could be hazardous for light weight and high profile vehicles. Locations impacted include... Saratoga, Hanna, Medicine Bow, Rock River, Elk Mountain, Lincoln Park Campground, Bow River Campground, Deep Creek Campground and Arlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; Upper North Platte River Basin
